face.transformationDescription:
[npc.Her] nose and mouth twitch and transform as they push out into an anthropomorphic mouse-like muzzle, and [npc.her] tongue transforms into a thin, mouse-like one. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.faceSkin+] quickly grows to cover [npc.her] new face, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, [npc.her] new face is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceSkin+], #ENDIF and as the transformation finally comes to an end, [npc.sheIs] left panting and sighing as [npc.she] [npc.verb(try)] to catch [npc.her] breath.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] an anthropomorphic [style.boldMouse(mouse-like face)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription]. Within [npc.her] [npc.mouth], [npc.she] [npc.has] a [style.boldMouse(thin, mouse-like tongue)].
face.bodyDescription: [npc.SheHasFull] [npc.a_feminineDescriptor(true)], anthropomorphic, mouse-like face [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with a long, rodent muzzle.
face.bodyDescriptionFeral: [npc.SheHasFull] the [npc.feminineDescriptor(true)] face of a feral [npc.legRace], which is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with a long, rodent muzzle.
